analysis.description:
ShineCoinToken.balances (/unique_chucks/20/0x70c59563a55ba2c67a0c27989f88bb8913b0e84c.sol#110-114) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- doTransfer (/unique_chucks/20/0x70c59563a55ba2c67a0c27989f88bb8913b0e84c.sol#185-378)
	- getBalancesOfAddress (/unique_chucks/20/0x70c59563a55ba2c67a0c27989f88bb8913b0e84c.sol#420-427)
	- balanceOfAt (/unique_chucks/20/0x70c59563a55ba2c67a0c27989f88bb8913b0e84c.sol#428-444)
	- generateTokens (/unique_chucks/20/0x70c59563a55ba2c67a0c27989f88bb8913b0e84c.sol#481-494)
	- destroyTokens (/unique_chucks/20/0x70c59563a55ba2c67a0c27989f88bb8913b0e84c.sol#494-511)
ShineCoinToken.isContract (/unique_chucks/20/0x70c59563a55ba2c67a0c27989f88bb8913b0e84c.sol#558-567) is declared view but contains assembly code

Reentrancy in ShineCoinToken.approve (/unique_chucks/20/0x70c59563a55ba2c67a0c27989f88bb8913b0e84c.sol#383-398):
	External calls:
	- ! TokenController(controller).onApprove(msg.sender,_spender,_amount) (/unique_chucks/20/0x70c59563a55ba2c67a0c27989f88bb8913b0e84c.sol#391-394)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allowed (/unique_chucks/20/0x70c59563a55ba2c67a0c27989f88bb8913b0e84c.sol#395)

Reentrancy in ShineCrowdFunder.generateReserve (/unique_chucks/20/0x70c59563a55ba2c67a0c27989f88bb8913b0e84c.sol#875-879):
	External calls:
	- exchangeToken.generateTokens(reserveTeamRecipient,reserveAmountTeam) (/unique_chucks/20/0x70c59563a55ba2c67a0c27989f88bb8913b0e84c.sol)
	- exchangeToken.generateTokens(reserveBountyRecipient,reserveAmountBounty) (/unique_chucks/20/0x70c59563a55ba2c67a0c27989f88bb8913b0e84c.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- isReserveGenerated (/unique_chucks/20/0x70c59563a55ba2c67a0c27989f88bb8913b0e84c.sol)

Reentrancy in ShineCrowdFunder.investment (/unique_chucks/20/0x70c59563a55ba2c67a0c27989f88bb8913b0e84c.sol#793-815):
	External calls:
	- exchangeToken.generateTokens(msg.sender,tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/20/0x70c59563a55ba2c67a0c27989f88bb8913b0e84c.sol#802-807)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokenExchangeRate (/unique_chucks/20/0x70c59563a55ba2c67a0c27989f88bb8913b0e84c.sol#807-808)
	- tokensIssued (/unique_chucks/20/0x70c59563a55ba2c67a0c27989f88bb8913b0e84c.sol#807)

ShineCrowdFunder.investment (/unique_chucks/20/0x70c59563a55ba2c67a0c27989f88bb8913b0e84c.sol#793-815) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-exchangeToken.generateTokens(msg.sender,tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/20/0x70c59563a55ba2c67a0c27989f88bb8913b0e84c.sol#802-807)

ShineCrowdFunder.payOut (/unique_chucks/20/0x70c59563a55ba2c67a0c27989f88bb8913b0e84c.sol#827-862) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-exchangeToken.changeReserveTeamRecepient(reserveTeamRecipient) (/unique_chucks/20/0x70c59563a55ba2c67a0c27989f88bb8913b0e84c.sol#861-862)

ShineCrowdFunder.generateReserve (/unique_chucks/20/0x70c59563a55ba2c67a0c27989f88bb8913b0e84c.sol#875-879) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-exchangeToken.generateTokens(reserveTeamRecipient,reserveAmountTeam) (/unique_chucks/20/0x70c59563a55ba2c67a0c27989f88bb8913b0e84c.sol)
	-exchangeToken.generateTokens(reserveBountyRecipient,reserveAmountBounty) (/unique_chucks/20/0x70c59563a55ba2c67a0c27989f88bb8913b0e84c.sol)

ShineCoinToken.getValueAt.min (local variable @ /unique_chucks/20/0x70c59563a55ba2c67a0c27989f88bb8913b0e84c.sol#527) shadows:
	- ShineCoinToken.min (function @ /unique_chucks/20/0x70c59563a55ba2c67a0c27989f88bb8913b0e84c.sol#567-574)

ShineCrowdFunder.payOut has external calls inside a loop:
	- investorAddress.transfer(investorAmount) (/unique_chucks/20/0x70c59563a55ba2c67a0c27989f88bb8913b0e84c.sol#842-843)

ShineCoinToken.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/20/0x70c59563a55ba2c67a0c27989f88bb8913b0e84c.sol#558-567)
	- /unique_chucks/20/0x70c59563a55ba2c67a0c27989f88bb8913b0e84c.sol#563-566

ShineCoinToken.version should be constant (/unique_chucks/20/0x70c59563a55ba2c67a0c27989f88bb8913b0e84c.sol#64-66)
ShineCrowdFunder.investorCount should be constant (/unique_chucks/20/0x70c59563a55ba2c67a0c27989f88bb8913b0e84c.sol#639-641)
